SELECT stockin.sid, stockin.scode,customer.cname,merchandise.mname,stockin.samount, stockin.stockindate,employee.ename from customer,merchandise,employee,stockin where stockin.customerid=customer.cid and stockin.employeeid=employee.eid and stockin.merchandiseid=merchandise.mid
and stockin.scode like '%${scode}%'
and employee.ename like '%${ename}%'
